Major_Arcs.title: Setting the Scene and Introducing Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main characters and settings, establishing initial conflicts and the central mystery of Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Refusal and Ghost Town Skepticism
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the woman in the green hat and the concept of Ghost Town, setting up initial character dynamics and narrative themes.

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town Flashback and Modern Disruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a flashback to Ghost Town's past and contrasts it with the modern-day threat of airport construction, escalating the central conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Modern Day Disruption: Airport Plans for Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Notions and Construction Site Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores romantic themes and shifts the setting to the construction site, introducing new characters and conflicts related to the airport project.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with Construction Workers and Disdain

Major_Arcs.title: Family Conflicts and Romantic Turmoil
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan's personal and family conflicts, particularly her strained relationship with her father and her romantic uncertainties.

sub_scenes.title: Airport Logistics and Father's Rebuke
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene combines business details about the airport plan with the introduction of Nan and her father's tense relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Conflicting Comforts and Nan's Decision
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores Nan's emotional distress and the differing advice she receives, leading to her decision to seek out Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Horses to the Airport and the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Cal's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's emotional confession to Cal and his somewhat detached reaction, culminating in his departure and her subsequent reflection.

Major_Arcs.title: The Winter Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to a severe winter storm and its impact on the community, highlighting themes of hardship, resilience, and unexpected aid.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Change and Livestock Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the sudden change in weather and the growing concerns about livestock and fodder.

narrative_arcs.title: Recollections of Changed Weather and Difficult Journey
Seeking Comfort and Reassurance Amidst Hardship
Recalling Past Winter's Severity and Impending Starvation
Riding Out to Face the Crisis and Uncertain Future

sub_scenes.title: Waiting, Worrying, and Skybound Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the community's anxious wait during the storm and the unexpected arrival of aid from the sky, bringing hope and relief.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Restlessness and Persistent Snowfall
The Sound of Hope: Arrival of a Plane
Relief from the Sky and Reflections on Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Cowtown Conflict and Benson's Introduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting in Cowtown and the character of Chane Benson, setting up conflicts related to his persona and actions.

sub_scenes.title: Cowtown Showdown and Character Analysis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a violent act and the subsequent reactions and analysis of his character by onlookers.

sub_scenes.title: Hero Worship and Gun Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores Jeff's hero worship and includes a tense gun confrontation, setting up future conflicts related to Benson and Jeff's behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Advice on Decency and Confrontation with Benson

Major_Arcs.title: Worries about Jeff and Benson's Ominous Nature
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally's deep concerns about Jeff's behavior and introduces a darker, more ominous side to Mr. Benson's character.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worried Thoughts and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Sally's internal worries about Jeff and her conversation with Clyde seeking reassurance and guidance.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern Over Jeff's Gun Obsession and Control
Reassurance and Premonition of Finding Jeff
Clyde's Retrospective Account of Jeff's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Mr. Benson and Ominous Tone Shift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Mr. Benson and quickly transitions from casual banter to a darker, more ominous tone, hinting at danger and violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Introducing Mr. Benson and Casual Banter
Mr. Benson's Ominous Tone Shift and Mention of Death

Major_Arcs.title: Benson's Defense and Escalating Tensions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc escalates the tension surrounding Benson, focusing on his justifications for violence and the growing conflict with Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Justification and Article Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents Benson's defense of his violent past and introduces the element of Clyde's controversial article about him.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Confrontation and Clyde's Defense
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally's angry confrontation with Clyde about the article and Clyde's justification for his actions, highlighting the escalating conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Justification for Writing About Benson
Sally's Distrust and Ominous Description of Benson

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Declaration and Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson directly and shows his assertive declaration and threat, escalating the conflict and setting up future confrontations.

narrative_arcs.title: Benson's Threat to Clean Up Juniper Town

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Invitation and Rising Suspicions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the dinner invitation to Chane Benson, exploring the motivations behind it and the growing suspicions and tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Flashback Context
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features accusations and denials related to threats and provides flashback context about Clyde's articles against Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback to Benson's Articles and Consequences

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Initial Observations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the planning and execution of the dinner invitation to Chane Benson, along with Sally's initial observations of his demeanor.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Inviting Chane Benson for Dinner
Sally's Persuasion and Jeff's Agreement to Invite Chane
Invitation to Dinner and Observation of Chane's Demeanor
Discussion on Chane's Artistic Skills and Character

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Tensions and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating tensions during the dinner with Chane Benson, culminating in betrayal and violent confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Conversation and Moonlight Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the continuation of the dinner conversation and the shift to a more private and suspicious interaction between Chane and Sally outdoors.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Accusation, and Unwanted Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts escalating tensions due to jealousy, accusations of a trap, and culminates in Chane's unwanted kiss and Sally's furious reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Confrontation and Accusation of Trap
Sally's Accusation and Demand for Honesty
Sally's Angry Explanation to Jeff about Chane's Actions and Intentions

Major_Arcs.title: Violent Confrontation and Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes the violent confrontation following the dinner, Jeff's fight with Chane, and the subsequent chase to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Upset and Chane's Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Jeff's reaction to Sally's explanation and the immediate confrontation by Chane, leading to physical violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Angry Confrontation and Jeff's Punch
Sally's Desperate Plea and Jeff's Fall

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Warning and Chase to Save Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally's urgent warning about Clyde's danger and Jeff's determined chase after Chane to intervene.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Warning and Chase After Chane

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict and Newspaper Victory
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the conflict with Benson, showing Chane's intervention, Benson's departure, and the subsequent newspaper triumph.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Threat and Chane's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Benson confronting Jeff, Chane's forceful intervention, and Benson being warned to leave town.

sub_scenes.title: Post-Confrontation Tension and Newspaper Triumph
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the emotional aftermath of the confrontation and the subsequent newspaper victory, highlighting the team's dedication and courage.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflict and Steve Daley's Arrival
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting at a ranch and a new conflict involving Betsy and Steve Daley's arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Introduction of Steve Daley
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a ranch setting and conflict, and then introduces Steve Daley as a new character hired by Betsy.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Approbation of Steve Daley's Hiring

sub_scenes.title: Lingering Doubts and Impending Range War
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores doubts about Steve Daley and reveals the brewing range war, setting up future conflicts.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of Accommodation and Lingering Doubts
Journey into Town and Expressed Gratitude
Hank's Orders and Material for a Dress

Major_Arcs.title: Town Confrontation and Gunfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Betsy's trip to town and the escalating confrontation with Fred Bridges, leading to a potential gunfight.

sub_scenes.title: Departure from Store and Fred Bridges' Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy leaving the store and being confronted by Fred Bridges, setting up immediate tension.

Major_Arcs.title: Decision to Hire a Gunslinger and Romantic Development
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Betsy's decision to hire a gunslinger and the rapidly developing romance between Betsy and Steve Daley.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Firm Decision and Justification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Betsy's firm decision to hire a gunslinger and her justifications to Hank and an authority figure.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Firm Decision to Hire a Gunslinger
Justification and Acceptance from Authority Figure
Hank's Concern and Betsy's Softened Stance

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confessions and Commitment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases the rapid development of romance between Betsy and Steve, culminating in mutual confessions of love and commitment.

narrative_arcs.title: Sudden Intense Feelings and Mutual Confession

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Confrontation and Horse Theft
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Old Man Bridges' arrival at the ranch, escalating tensions, and the subsequent theft of horses, escalating the range war.

sub_scenes.title: Old Man Bridges' Arrival and Ranch Hand Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Old Man Bridges and the aggressive confrontation by ranch hands.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Man Bridges' Arrival and Ranch Hands' Confrontation
Betsy's Warning and Steve's Determination Amidst Threats
Betsy's Assertion of Authority on Gun Use
Aftermath: Horse Theft and Realization of Loss

Major_Arcs.title: Pursuit to Devil's Pass and Romantic Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the pursuit to Devil's Pass, culminating in a confrontation and a romantic resolution for Betsy and Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Plea and Steve's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's desperate pleas to stop Steve and his resolute departure to Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Devil's Pass and Arrival at Gunfire Scene

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation at Devil's Pass, Betsy's intervention, and the romantic resolution between Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Rancher's Daughter's Conflicts and Fence Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new set of characters and conflicts, focusing on the Rancher's daughter and a dispute over fencing and water access.

sub_scenes.title: Personal Conflict and Ranch Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Rancher's daughter and her personal conflict, alongside emerging ranch concerns.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Concerns about Curley and Outsiders

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Gunpoint Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the fence dispute and the escalating confrontation with Fred Gordon, culminating in a gunpoint standoff.

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Complexities and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the complex relationships between Carrie, Dave, and Fred Gordon, leading to a romantic resolution for Carrie.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Lingering Guilt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with apologies and reconciliation among riders and transitions to Carrie and Dave discussing past events and lingering guilt.

sub_scenes.title: Love Confessions and Contract Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the clarification of affections, Carrie's confessions, and the resolution of the Carlton contract business.

narrative_arcs.title: Assertion of Independence and Business Acumen

sub_scenes.title: Final Romantic Resolution and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides the final romantic resolution for Carrie and Fred and the departure of Dave, concluding their love triangle.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Intuition and Long Ride Reflection
Revelation of Fred's Arrival and Misunderstanding
Carlton's Explanation of the Beef Contract
Realization of Foolishness and Seeking Reassurance
Affectionate Embrace and Plea for Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Injury, Escape, and Rance's Recovery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to the story of Dirk and Rance, focusing on Dirk's injury, their escape attempt, and Rance's subsequent recovery and romantic resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Injury and Grandfather's Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Dirk's injury, sets up a mistaken identity scenario, and introduces the grandfather's concern and investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Dirk's Injury and Medical Examination

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Arrival and Ranch Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marshal Rance Cready and depicts his arrival at the ranch, leading to a confrontation and misunderstandings.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Confrontation and Demand for Authority
Law vs. Justice and Dirk's Injury

sub_scenes.title: Love Triangle and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene develops a love triangle between the Ranch Owner, Chris, and Rance, leading to Chris's confession and an escape plan for Dirk.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Understanding and Escape Plan

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Pursuit, and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dirk and Chris's escape attempt, the Marshal's pursuit, and the ensuing gunfight.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Romantic Resolution for Rance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the aftermath of the gunfight, Dirk's successful escape, and the romantic resolution for Rance and the Ranch Owner.

narrative_arcs.title: Leaving the Wounded Marshal and Woman's Reflection
Dirk's Farewell and Escape to Mexico
Chris's Return to Rance and Woman's Thoughts
Rance's Pursuit and Dirk's Escape Confirmed
Clearing Chris's Name and Woman's Forgiveness
Confession of Love and Lingering Fear
Confrontation and Clarification at the Wedding
